ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Woe that Day to the deniers:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Ah the woe that day for those who deny,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Woe, then, to those that give the lie,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Woe, on that day, to those who have rejected God's revelations
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Ruin is for the deniers on that day!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Woe, that Day, to those who deny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Woe on that day to the rejecters,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Woe that day unto those who cry it lies,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Woe, on that Day, to those who reject,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Woe on that Day unto the belviers-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Woe to the deniers on that day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Woe, that Day, to those that deny-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Woe, that Day, to those who deny [(Allah, His Angels, His Books, His Messengers, the Day of Resurrection, and Al-Qadar (Divine Preordainments)].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Woe on that Day to those who belied it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Woe on that Day to the deniers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:10] Woe to the deniers on that day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Woe) severe punishment (unto the repudiators) unto the deniers of faith and the resurrection (on that day) the Day of Judgement!
